txt.en: Dervorin sighs.\n\n'I have a long day ahead of me.'
TBD BAD BOSS has been apprehended.\n\nTalk to Dervorin.
Regroup with Dervorin and the workers
You set out with Dervorin to confront Dravron.
The fight is over.\n\nRegroup with the others.
Talk to Dervorin before the negotiation begins.

'[placeholder], I did not think I would be fighting alongside you so soon. As dire as our situation was during the war, I preferred crossing blades with vicious Orcs than my own countrymen twisted by greed and delusions of grandeur, but there is no time to dwell on these things.

'We must summon the guard and the healers, and I must determine how to proceed with the operation of this lumber camp.

'Given Dravron's outrageous actions, I have all the justification I need to strip the land from his possession.'
Listen to Dervorin and Dravron's conversation.
'We return to Lhan Garan without delay. Ardhun will come with us. I will tï¿½
